definition: only a very short time before, of moral excellence
details:
adverb
- only a very short time before
= synonyms: barely
- exactly at this moment or the moment described
= example: exactly at this moment or the moment described
- and nothing more
= synonyms: merely, simply, only, but
- only a moment ago
= example: only a moment ago
= synonyms: just now
- indicating exactness or preciseness
= synonyms: precisely, exactly
- absolutely
= example: absolutely
= synonyms: simply, simply
adjective
- of moral excellence
= synonyms: good, upright
- free from favoritism or self-interest or bias or deception
= synonyms: fair
- fair to all parties as dictated by reason and conscience
= synonyms: equitable
- used especially of what is legally or ethically right or proper or fitting
= example: used especially of what is legally or ethically right or proper or fitting
